title: No Stranger to the Shadows (1U108)
text:
Set:	The Fellowship of the Ring
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Gondor
Twilight:	0
Card Type:	Condition
Game Text:	Bearer must be a ranger. Limit 1 per ranger. Each site's shadow number is -1.
Lore:	”'Ah, but you had not got me with you then,' laughed Strider. 'My cuts, short or long, don't go wrong.'”
Rarity:	U
Notes:	Lists: ERL, MXL
